A SwitchableViewport is one that only brings its remote rooms into view when it’s switched on. [DEFINED ON VIEWPORT EXTENSION]

class SwitchableViewport :   Viewport

isViewingOVERRIDDEN

viewport.t[139]

no description available

lookThroughToViewOVERRIDDEN

viewport.t[159]

Since a SwitchableViewport will typically be used to implement something like a CCTV screen, by default it’s not something we’d look through in order to view the remote locations.
